# package_desafio_DIO

Description. 
The package package_desafio_DIO is used to:
	- Processing:
		- Histrogram matching
		- Structural similarity
		- Reseze image
	- Utils:
		- Read image
		- Save image
		- Plot image
		- Plot result
		- Plot histrogram

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to installpackage_desafio_DIO

```bash
pip install package_desafio_DIO
```
